feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Use Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about the features of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that you can use when you work with multitenant systems. See guidance and examples for how to use AKS in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Microsoft Security Solutions for AWS
entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft security solutions can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) account access and environments.

entry.title: Subscription Vending Implementation Guidance
entry.summary: Learn how to implement subscription vending to standardize the process for automatic subscription creation and deploy workloads faster.

entry.title: Use Azure Kubernetes Service to Host GPU-Based Workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Kubernetes Service to host GPU-based workloads, including machine learning, deep learning, and high-performance computing (HPC) workloads.

entry.title: Measure Azure App Sustainability by Using the SCI Score
entry.summary: Create a sustainability model based on available proxies that scores the carbon impact of an application by using the SCI score.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra security for AWS
entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.title: Baseline Architecture for an AKS Cluster
entry.summary: Learn about the reference architecture for the recommended baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Deploy Azure Landing Zones
entry.summary: Learn about deployment options for both platform and application landing zones in Azure to help ensure governance at scale.

entry.title: Stream Processing with Databricks
entry.summary: Learn how to create a four-stage, end-to-end stream processing pipeline in Azure by using Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Web-Queue-Worker Architecture Style
entry.summary: Learn about the Web-Queue-Worker pattern. Discover benefits, challenges, and implementation by using Azure App Service, Azure Functions, and message queues.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) - Planning
entry.summary: Learn how to plan, design, and operate Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters, from foundational concepts to production-ready baseline implementations.

entry.title: Azure Application Architecture Fundamentals
entry.summary: Learn about structured approaches to designing scalable, resilient, and highly available applications on Azure. Follow best practices for cloud applications.

entry.title: Baseline Microsoft Foundry Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to build network-secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications by using Microsoft Foundry tools and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Mission-Critical Global Content Delivery
entry.summary: Learn how to develop highly resilient global HTTP applications when your focus is on content delivery and caching.

entry.title: Mission-Critical Global HTTP Ingress
entry.summary: Learn how to develop highly resilient global HTTP applications when your focus is on HTTP ingress.

entry.title: Considerations for Using Azure Container Apps in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about Azure Container Apps features that are useful in multitenant systems, including scalability, isolation, and resource management.

entry.title: Guidance for Using Azure Database for PostgreSQL in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about the Azure Database for PostgreSQL features that are useful when you work with multitenant systems. Explore guidance and examples.

entry.title: Micro Focus Enterprise Server on Azure VMs
entry.summary: Optimize, modernize, and streamline IBM z/OS mainframe applications by using Micro Focus Enterprise Server 6.0 on Azure VMs.

entry.title: Mission-Critical Baseline with App Service
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy mission-critical web applications by using the Web Apps feature of Azure App Service and the reliable web app pattern.

entry.summary: Get started with AI. Use high-level architectural types, see Azure AI platform offerings, and find customer success stories.

entry.summary: Learn about a baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant Azure App Service web application.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Fabric, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and Azure Data Lake Storage to modernize legacy and on-premises data.

entry.summary: Learn how to develop highly resilient global web applications.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for Messaging in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn architectural approaches for messaging in multitenant solutions, including when to deploy shared, sharded, and dedicated messaging components.

entry.title: Automate Document Classification in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use the durable functions feature of Azure Functions as an automated document processing pipeline to classify documents by type.

entry.title: Build and Deploy Custom Document Processing Models on Azure
entry.summary: Learn more about Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Overview of Microsoft Machine Learning Products and Technologies
entry.summary: Compare options for building, deploying, and managing your machine learning models. Decide which Microsoft products to choose for your solution.

entry.title: Extract and Map Information from Unstructured Content
entry.summary: Learn how to build scalable systems for processing text, images, tables, and graphs with quality checks and human review for professional content workflows.

entry.summary: Learn how to design and deploy scalable multiâ€‘agent automation infrastructure by using Microsoft Agent Framework, Azure Container Apps, and Azure AI services.

entry.summary: Get started with AI. Use high-level architectural types, see Azure AI platform offerings, and find customer success stories.

entry.summary: Learn how to replatform and deploy existing Kubernetes microservice applications workloads to run in Azure Container Apps.

entry.title: Choose an Azure Service for Vector Search
entry.summary: Learn how to use this information to decide which Azure service for vector search best suits your application.

entry.title: Build a Conversation Knowledge Mining Solution by using Azure AI Services
entry.summary: Learn how to design a scalable conversation analytics system that extracts insights from conversational data by using Azure AI services and Microsoft Foundry.

entry.title: Generate Documents from Your Data
entry.summary: Learn how to build a simple system to generate documents. It combines retrieval, summarization, and generation to support faster document drafting by using AI.

entry.summary: Learn about deploying the baseline Microsoft Foundry, Foundry Agent Service, Azure OpenAI in Foundry Models, and Azure App Service chat architecture in an Azure landing zone.

entry.summary: Learn about what to consider when you design a large language model RAG solution, including each step of the development process and how to evaluate those steps.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft data services to build a modern analytics platform capable of handling the most common data challenges in an organization.

entry.title: Understand Data Models
entry.summary: Learn how to evaluate Azure data store models based on workload patterns, scale, consistency, and governance to guide service selection.

entry.title: SaaS and Multitenant Solution Architecture
entry.summary: This guide provides an overview of the architectural content for software as a service (SaaS), startups, and multitenancy and guidance about how to architect multitenant solutions on Azure.

entry.title: Guidance for using Azure Private Link service in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Private Link that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Architectural Considerations for Identity in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about multitenant identity architecture with authentication, authorization, SSO, federation, and tenant isolation strategies for secure solutions.

entry.title: Reliable Web App Pattern for .NET
entry.summary: Implement the Reliable Web App pattern for .NET. Migrate (replatform) web apps to the cloud with prescriptive architecture, code, and configuration guidance.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Qlik Replicate to migrate mainframe and midrange systems to the cloud or extend those systems by using cloud applications.

entry.summary: Compare technology choices for big data batch processing in Azure, including key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.summary: This example describes a data-first approach to middleware integration that enables IBM message queues (MQs).

entry.summary: Learn how to use DevSecOps for IaC to more securely and efficiently deploy cloud infrastructure into a new Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Design to Support Foundation Model Life Cycles
entry.summary: Learn about how to manage both new model versions and retired model versions in your generative AI application infrastructure.

entry.title: Use Azure Firewall to help protect an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

entry.summary: Run Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster in multiple regions to achieve high availability.

entry.title: Compare Java application hosting options on Azure
entry.summary: Explore recommended strategies for hosting Java applications to Azure, including platform types and supportability.

entry.title: Prevent IPv4 Exhaustion in Azure
entry.summary: Minimize private address space consumption when you build large networks in Azure. This article presents two methods to create more IPv4 address space.

entry.title: Monitoring and diagnostics guidance
entry.summary: Learn how to track how users use your distributed applications and services, trace resource utilization, and monitor the health and performance.

entry.title: Google Cloud to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.summary: Learn how caching can improve the performance and scalability of a system by copying frequently accessed data to fast storage close to the application.

entry.summary: Learn about managing data in a microservices architecture. Data integrity and data consistency pose critical challenges for microservices.

entry.summary: Implement the Reliable Web App pattern for Java. Get essential guidance for migrating web apps to the cloud. Learn how to replatform web apps.

entry.summary: Deploy MongoDB Atlas in Azure with secure private connectivity by using single-region and multi-region architectures for scalable workloads.

entry.summary: Download official Azure icons, Azure logo files, and Azure architecture icons to create clear, professional cloud diagrams.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the durable functions feature of Azure Functions as an automated document processing pipeline to classify documents by type.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Precisely Connect to replicate mainframe and midrange data to Azure in real time with change data capture.

entry.title: Develop a RAG Solution - Chunking Phase
entry.summary: Learn about the various chunking strategies like boundary based, custom code, and document analysis models. Also learn about how the document structure should influence your chunking strategy.

entry.summary: Learn how to augment your chunks with metadata like title, summary, keywords, entities, and more and learn common cleaning methods that can improve vector matches.

entry.summary: Learn how embeddings work, how to choose an embedding model, and how your embedding model can affect your vector search results.

entry.summary: Learn about how to evaluate your RAG solution from end to end by calculating and evaluating key large language model and similarity metrics.

entry.title: Develop a RAG Solution - Preparation Phase
entry.summary: Learn how to analyze and gather representative content such as documents, images, videos, and audio files and develop test queries to validate your RAG solution.

entry.summary: Learn about a scalable, secure AKS microservices architecture that builds on recommended AKS microservices baseline architectures and implementations.

entry.summary: Learn how to use BMC AMI Cloud to send mainframe data directly to Azure Blob Storage as part of a mainframe modernization migration.

entry.summary: Learn how to design an architecture on Azure for a regulated environment that allows researchers to access sensitive data.

entry.summary: Learn how to develop resilient and scalable code that runs on Azure Functions and responds to Event Hubs events.

entry.summary: View guidance on separating data partitions to be managed and accessed separately in different services, such as Azure AI Search, Azure storage queues, and more.

entry.summary: Learn how to track how users use your distributed applications and services, trace resource utilization, and monitor the health and performance.

entry.summary: Learn how to handle transient faults caused by loss of network connectivity, temporary unavailability, or timeouts.

entry.summary: How to use Azure Cosmos DB, change feed, and Azure Service Bus for reliable messaging and guaranteed delivery of domain events in distributed applications.

entry.summary: In this scenario, an e-commerce company in the travel industry uses Azure API Management to migrate a legacy web application.
